item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 24, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Beyond the route: Introducing granular MTA bus speed data (88 points | 16 comments)
2. Show HN: OpenFreeMap – Open-Source Map Hosting (542 points | 163 comments)
3. Launch HN: Modern Realty (YC S24) – AI Real Estate Agent for Home Buyers (83 points | 176 comments)
4. Move Fast and Abandon Things (283 points | 98 comments)
5. GSoC'24: Differentiable Logic for Interactive Systems and Generative Music (38 points | 2 comments)
6. Death of the Department Store (25 points | 27 comments)
7. Winamp Legacy player source code (517 points | 245 comments)
8. Neat Randomized Algorithms: RandDiag for Rapidly Diagonalizing Normal Matrices (31 points | 3 comments)
9. Show HN: JSON For You – Visualize JSON in graph or table views (126 points | 27 comments)
10. Star FTX Witness Caroline Ellison Sentenced to Two Years in Prison (22 points | discuss)
11. Wasm2Mpy: Compiling WASM to MicroPython so it can run on Raspberrys (17 points | 4 comments)
12. Fully documented source code for Lander on the Acorn Archimedes (139 points | 33 comments)
13. Attracting and Retaining Debian Contributors (97 points | 65 comments)
14. "Creounity Time Machine", the universal date converter for coin collectors (23 points | discuss)
15. The quest to build a telescope on the moon (105 points | 58 comments)
16. Caroline Ellison, Star Witness at FTX Trial, Is Sentenced to 2 Years in Prison (14 points | 1 comment)
17. Jetstream: Shrinking the AT Protocol Firehose by >99% (134 points | 89 comments)
18. 45 years ago CompuServe connected the world before the World Wide Web (92 points | 80 comments)
19. Twitter/X will let people you've blocked see your posts (43 points | 103 comments)
20. DOJ accuses Visa of monopoly that affects price of 'nearly everything’ (185 points | 119 comments)
21. Life without Aadhaar (58 points | 52 comments)
22. OpenBSD now enforcing no invalid NUL characters in shell scripts (139 points | 126 comments)
23. Maker Pipe – Structural Pipe Fittings for DIY Builders (216 points | 109 comments)
24. Giving T cells extra batteries supercharges them against cancer (148 points | 66 comments)
25. Tracy: A real time, nanosecond resolution frame profiler (164 points | 26 comments)
26. Galilean Moons and Determination of Longitude (3 points | discuss)
27. My Camera Will Never Overheat Again [video] (3 points | 2 comments)
28. Radioactive Tape Dispenser (1970s) (76 points | 43 comments)
29. One Collatz Coincidence (75 points | 22 comments)
30. We fine-tuned Llama 405B on AMD GPUs (452 points | 87 comments)
